cleaned_text: What we're about Healthsted University of Integrative Medicine is a group of holistic integrative medicine advocates and practitioners from Chicago and the Suburbs who enjoy meeting and connecting with people. Our mission is to strengthen our advocacy on holistic integrative medicine in the Chicagoland area. Our members enjoy traveling, staying physically fit, keeping active, constant learning and meeting new people. We embrace healthy lifestyle choices that include nutrition, exercise, and fitness, nurturing our spirituality, and thrive on forming meaningful connections with others. Some of our future events might include Integrative Medicine workshops, healthy food parties and picnics, volunteering, the arts, exploring Chicago, and much more. Want to add events to the calendar?
